column3: honestly I think the whole comment is pretty redundant? I'd be more inclined to just delete it

> 
> 
> honestly I think the whole comment is pretty redundant? I'd be more inclined to just delete it

I agree that it mostly describes what can be seen in the code anyway (name of the function being called, name of the variable the result is being assigned to), the only informational part is the resulting script type. Shortened the comments it for both the pubkey (-> P2WPKH) and the mult
